metadata.description: Benchmark test queries for rigrun semantic cache testing

semantic_groups.name: recursion_explanation
semantic_groups.description: Different ways to ask about recursion - should all hit semantic cache
queries: Can you describe recursion in programming?

semantic_groups.name: debugging_help
semantic_groups.description: Various ways to ask for debugging assistance

semantic_groups.name: function_creation
queries: Write a function to sort an array
Create a method to sort a list
Make a function that sorts elements

semantic_groups.name: code_explanation
queries: Can you walk me through this code?
Break down this code for me

semantic_groups.name: async_programming
queries: How do I use await in JavaScript?

semantic_groups.name: api_requests
queries: How do I make an API request?
Show me how to call a REST API
How to fetch data from an API
Send a request to an endpoint

semantic_groups.name: database_queries
queries: How do I query a database?
How to fetch data from a database

semantic_groups.name: testing_code
queries: How do I write unit tests?
Write a test for this function

semantic_groups.name: git_operations
queries: How do I create a git branch?
Create a new branch in git

semantic_groups.name: performance_optimization
queries: How do I optimize this code?

semantic_groups.name: data_structures
queries: When to use a hash map

semantic_groups.name: regex_patterns
queries: How do I write a regex?

distinct_queries.description: Unique code generation requests - should NOT match each other
queries: Write a binary search algorithm in Python
Create a linked list implementation in JavaScript
Implement a stack data structure in Rust
Build a REST API endpoint in Node.js
Create a caching decorator in Python
Why does this Python list comprehension return None?
Fix the null pointer exception in this Java code
Debug the async race condition in this JavaScript
Why is my React component not re-rendering?
Fix the SQL injection vulnerability here
Debug the memory leak in this C++ code
Why does this regex not match correctly?
Fix the CORS error in this fetch request
Debug the infinite loop in this recursion
Why is my Docker container not starting?
How do I use React hooks for state management?
Set up a Django REST framework project
Create a Vue.js component with TypeScript
Configure ESLint for a TypeScript project
Set up Jest for React testing
Create a FastAPI endpoint with Pydantic
Configure Tailwind CSS in a Next.js app
Set up GitHub Actions for CI/CD
When should I use event-driven architecture?
How to design a scalable database schema?
When to use GraphQL vs REST?
How to implement circuit breaker pattern?
How to design a message queue system?
When to use NoSQL vs SQL databases?
How to set up Kubernetes cluster?
Configure nginx as a reverse proxy
Configure SSL certificates with Let's Encrypt
Set up monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana
How to optimize Docker image size?
Set up log aggregation with ELK stack
How to implement infrastructure as code with Terraform?

stress_test_queries: What is the capital of France?
What is a loop in programming?

edge_cases.name: with_code_blocks
queries:
Fix this: ```python
def foo():
    return bar
```

expected_results.description: Within each semantic_group, after the first query is answered, subsequent queries should hit the semantic cache with 60%+ probability. Exact repeats should hit 95%+ of the time.
